subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Vendee Globe Challenge
lead_paragraph: The French sailor François Gabart won the Vendée Globe around-the-world race in record time, shaving six days off the mark set by his countryman Michel Desjoyeaux.
snippet: The French sailor François Gabart won the Vendée Globe around-the-world race in record time, shaving six days off the mark set by his countryman Michel Desjoyeaux.
